meanings.sent1: The overconcerning news about the storm made everyone nervous.
meanings.sent2: Her overconcerning behavior towards her grades was starting to affect her health.
meanings.sent3: He was so overconcerning about his plants that he watered them every hour!
meanings.sent4: The overconcerning dark clouds signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The overconcerning thoughts kept her awake at night, unable to relax.

meanings.definition: Showing too much concern or interest.
meanings.sent1: His overconcerning attitude towards his friend's choices was becoming annoying.
meanings.sent2: The overconcerning parent constantly checked on their child's every move.
meanings.sent3: She was so overconcerning about her favorite TV show that she watched every episode twice.
meanings.sent4: The overconcerning detective never missed a single detail in the case.
meanings.sent5: The overconcerning teacher knew every student's schedule by heart.

meanings.definition: To worry or be anxious about something too much.
meanings.sent1: She tends to overconcern about her upcoming exams, even though she studies hard.
meanings.sent2: He overconcerned about the presentation to the point of losing sleep.
meanings.sent3: The cat overconcerned about the mouse in the corner, not realizing it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: His mind overconcerned about the future, unable to enjoy the present moment.
meanings.sent5: The overconcerning mother hen watched her chicks closely, always worried about their safety.
